> POLL QUESTION: I think I know how to bring the rpg 
> back.  We need to turn it into a 
> contest where you get points for your 
> chars.  Naturally the RPer's success 
> would be more important than the 
> chars.  For winning a battle (like 
> Sunhawk did) you might get 2 or 3 
> points, for rping the battle well (like 
> Sunhawk did) you might get 15 or 16 
> points, for having your char voted most 
> messed up in the head (Sunhawk will be) 
> 50 or 60 points.  Whatt' you think? 
>

> - yes, 1 votes, 25.00%  
> - no, 3 votes, 75.00%
